the remaining trouble spots in algol 60this paper lists the ambiguities remainingin the language algol 60 which have been noticed since the publication of the revised algol 60 report in 1963.cacm october 1967knuth d e.ca671002 jb february 27 1978 2:40 pm1530 4 15311531 4 15311531 4 15311565 4 15311703 4 15311945 4 15312036 4 15312707 4 15312753 4 15311185 5 15311455 5 15311531 5 15311531 5 15311531 5 15311781 5 1531123 6 1531196 6 1531919 6 1531990 6 15311007 6 15311046 6 15311131 6 15311139 6 15311140 6 15311149 6 15311198 6 15311215 6 15311223 6 15311265 6 15311303 6 15311323 6 15311358 6 15311366 6 15311421 6 15311460 6 15311462 6 15311463 6 15311467 6 15311468 6 15311477 6 15311491 6 15311496 6 15311531 6 15311535 6 15311565 6 15311601 6 15311602 6 15311613 6 15311614 6 15311626 6 15311641 6 15311787 6 15311788 6 1531205 6 1531224 6 1531249 6 1531288 6 1531316 6 1531381 6 1531398 6 153111 6 1531404 6 1531410 6 1531463 6 1531464 6 1531483 6 15313184 6 15313188 6 1531584 6 1531600 6 1531680 6 1531691 6 1531763 6 1531799 6 1531
